tag_list: hardwell dyro bright lights never say goodbye wildstylez remix download itunes
title: Hardwell & Dyro feat. Bright Lights - Never Say Goodbye (Wildstylez Remix) - OUT NOW!
description:
Out now on Beatport: http://btprt.dj/12DxkPD
iTunes (Radio Edit): http://bit.ly/NsgWildstylezRemix
Get the original mix here: http://bit.ly/NeverSayGoodbye_RVR

Away from its obvious ties with cutting edge EDM, Holland has always been a leading nation of Hardstyle action. Revealed Recordings have not been blind to this, bringing on leading genre advocate Wildstylez to give Hardwell, Dyro & Bright Light's Beatport chart-topping offering “Never Say Goodbye” an unexpected reimagining of the highest caliber. In a catchy and power remix of raw rave energy, the infamous ending number to Hardwell’s own summer festival livesets shows the full crowd-rocking potential of Wildstylez and this understated genre. An infectious and unexpected remodel in the ultimate summer-like vein,” Heather Bright’s infectious topline transfers seamlessly in a positively divergent remix for Revealed Recordings and its summer artillery.

Fore more info:
